sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"unity-basics"}}>{`Unity Basics`}</MDXTag>
{/* TOC */}
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#unity-basics"}}>{`Unity Basics`}</MDXTag>{` - `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#overview"}}>{`Overview`}</MDXTag>{` - `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#scene-view---navigation-and-positioning"}}>{`Scene View - Navigation and Positioning`}</MDXTag>{` - `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#scene-view-controls"}}>{`Scene View Controls`}</MDXTag>{` - `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#the-game-view"}}>{`The Game View`}</MDXTag>{` - `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"#the-toolbar"}}>{`The Toolbar`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
{/* /TOC */}
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The initial `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`default layout`}</MDXTag>{` is the initial arrangement. You can change the layout on the top right.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"overview"}}>{`Overview`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The hierarchy is on the left side of the screen. It's the list of objects in the scene.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The bottom part is full of the assets.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The main screen has the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`scene`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`game`}</MDXTag>{` views that allow you to see different perspectives.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`There are also a number of different preset values that you can use as well.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can also use the tab and drag to rearrange the view.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"scene-view---navigation-and-positioning"}}>{`Scene View - Navigation and Positioning`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A quick navigation is to right click and use the arrows to move around. You can also use the mouse to change the direction of view.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`F`}</MDXTag>{` key after selecting an object will focus in on the object.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can orbit by holding `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`alt`}</MDXTag>{` and dragging.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Position Tools`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Q: Pan`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`W: Move`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`E: Rotate`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`R: Scale`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"scene-view-controls"}}>{`Scene View Controls`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`scene gizmo`}</MDXTag>{` is the viewing angle at the top right.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`shaded`}</MDXTag>{` dropdown is to switch between different dropdowns.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The lighting is good for checking scenes that are or are not dark.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can use the gizmos dropdown to switch between gizmos.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can use the search box in order to find elements quickly.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"the-game-view"}}>{`The Game View`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The game view will show what the game will look like at the end.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can select 2 by 3 to see a view of everything.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"the-toolbar"}}>{`The Toolbar`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
